tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I really had an excellent experience with Dr Roopa Prasad. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************* *** ***** ****** She is very friendly, hear your issues, work of it efficiently and give the best result. She is very motivating and understand patient‚Äôs comfort zone. She always give an advise which is more beneficial to patient‚Äôs. 
Must recommended doctor.
Yes there be a waiting long durations, but it‚Äôs obvious as gynaecologist do have many emergencies of delivery or surgeries. They don‚Äôt have 100 percent plan surgery, so I feel its ok to have a bit longer waiting duration.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr. Roopa during the tenure of my wife's pregnency. We found a mentor, a friend and an expert in her. She is easily approachable even during off hours. The entire process alongside the delivery were smooth. We definitely recommend her, if you are looking for a normal delivery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are really very happy & blessed to have Dr.  Roopa. Every problem is minutely examined & monitored by her ..There were a lot of health issues after I became pregnant as I am in my late 30's but my journey to pregnancy has become smooth because of our Doctor.. Thank you to Ela for introducing us to these two Doctors-Dr Mohit Saraogi & Dr Roopa...Having a baby was a dream which became possible only after meeting these two amazing Doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr roopa and dr mohit team is bst ... treatment is awesome they made impossible thing possible ....my wife was suffering from follicular cyst ...most of dr said she cant b pragnent ... but they treated me from this and today she gave birth to baby girl ... on any point within this one year while treatment i nevr felt they not up to mark ... evry time we visted hospital it was less hospital more like home ... thanks to roopa prasad and mohit ... just bcoz of them we in parent hood ... thanks once again

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Based on online rating I put up a query on their site.  Few days later I received a call from doctor Mohit. He explained all procedures clearly.  So we decided to meet docter personally.  When visitied first time,  Dr. Roopa was available and it was like our destiny to meet her. 
She is very friendly , open and approachable . Once you talk with her,  your half tension is gone.  Second half tension gets treated by their treatment.  Dr. Mohit is also equally good.  They both are very capable Doctors and surely having best of facilities.

tags: None
review: Dr Roopa Prasad has been extremely patient with me throughout my term. All questions were answered and I was completely at ease. This really helped me to sail through pregnancy. She is reasonable when it comes to her visit charges and stands true to minimal invasive procedure. A big thank you from me and all my family members!! Keep up the good work Doc.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
